title: In situ formed catalysts for active, durable, and thermally stable ammonia protonic ceramic fuel cells at 550 °C
content:
Energy Environ. Sci., 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D4EE00219A, Paper
Hua Zhang, Kang Xu, Yangsen Xu, Fan He, Feng Zhu, Kotaro Sasaki, YongMan Choi, Yu Chen
In situ formed hetero-structured catalysts are reported to enhance the activity, durability, and thermal stability of NH3-PCFC at low temperatures of 550 °C and/or below.
To cite this article before page numbers are assigned, use the DOI form of citation above.
